translations: 娼妓，妓女；（冒犯）乱搞男女关系的女人
追求不道德的东西（尤指金钱）；当妓女；嫖妓

sentences.sentence: So she even admired whores a little bit.
sentences.translation: 因此她对破鞋还有一点钦佩。

sentences.sentence: All he found were wild dogs with dust on them and 12-year-old whores.
sentences.translation: 他所见到的不过是浑身尘土的野狗和12岁的童妓。

sentences.sentence: If they wanna keep their business to Japanese men and their whores, they shouldn't advertise to Chinese people.
sentences.translation: 如果他们的客户群只是针对日本人及其他们的“小姐”，那就不要用中文登广告给同胞看！
